description:
goauth2: Fixing broken JWT example.

The JWT example was broken with at Revision: 1f6bde75551d due to the removal
of the stdHeader.  The jwt.NewToken function is now more appropriate than
creating the structs by hand unless you are using an external signer.  This
updates the example to the best practice for the most common use case.

Also fixing a bad grammars in jwt.go.

Fixes issue 16.

messages.text: I've never used this as a review tool, but the code looks good, and it works, so thanks for the help! I've got it working with bigquery.

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/goauth2/source/detail?r=2d711318934b ***

goauth2: Fixing broken JWT example.

The JWT example was broken with at Revision: 1f6bde75551d due to the removal
of the stdHeader.  The jwt.NewToken function is now more appropriate than
creating the structs by hand unless you are using an external signer.  This
updates the example to the best practice for the most common use case.

Also fixing a bad grammars in jwt.go.

Fixes issue 16.

R=jevans, adg
CC=golang-dev
